attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the pool unit instance.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Type of Pool Unit is either RAID group or external virtual disk.

attributes.name: health
attributes.description: Health information for the pool unit, as defined by the health resource type.

attributes.name: operationalStatus
attributes.description: Operational statuses for the pool unit.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the pool unit instance.

attributes.name: wwn
attributes.description: World Wide Name (WWN) of the Pool Unit.

attributes.name: sizeTotal
attributes.description: Total usable size of the Pool Unit

attributes.name: pool
attributes.description: Pool to which the disk belongs, as defined by the pool resource type. If the this attribute is null the poolUnit is not part of a pool.
